Desc: "Join the Eremites and Embrace a Wonderful New Life!"

Talent.Name: Eremite Teatime
Talent.Desc: If you have multiple characters of the same Elemental Type, then choose 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3104}Location card from 3 to add to your Hand;\nIf you have multiple characters that use the same type of weapon, then choose 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3102}Item card from 3 to add to your Hand;\nIf you have characters that belong to the same faction, then choose 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food card from 3 to add to your Hand.
